attributes.action: Tackle the cost of living crisis URGENTLY!
attributes.additional_details:
The cost of living crisis hitting millions of households is about to get a whole lot worse.

UK gas producers and electricity generators are set to make excess profits totalling as much as £170 billion over the next two years, according to Treasury estimates that lay bare the revenue-raising potential of a windfall tax - handed to shareholders in higher dividends and share buybacks. So the government could apply the 25% without any tax breaks, generating a sum nearer £15bn.
attributes.background: Our government needs to tackle the cost of living crisis NOW and protect the people by energy reforms including nationalising energy companies or implement a windfall tax on the soaring profits of the nations energy companies which line shareholder and CEO pockets.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do, such as increasing or extending the windfall tax
